age_of_creation.name: Age of Creation
age_of_creation.description: When the gods shaped the world and brought life to Ashbee Realms
key_events: The Primordial Gods create the world
First life emerges from the World Tree
Magic flows freely through all things
Dragons are born from elemental chaos

age_of_harmony.name: Age of Harmony
age_of_harmony.description: When all races lived in peace under the guidance of the Celestials

age_of_shadow.name: Age of Shadow
age_of_shadow.description: The present age, where darkness creeps back into the world
key_events: Heroes rise to face the darkness

ancient_evil.name: The Nameless One
ancient_evil.title: The Ancient Evil
ancient_evil.description: An entity of pure darkness sealed away in ancient times
ancient_evil.origin: Born from the nightmares of dying gods
ancient_evil.prophecy: When the seals weaken and corruption spreads, a hero must rise to face the Ancient Evil, or all shall be consumed by shadow.
fragments: The Shadow Heart - sealed in the Cursed Swamp
The Void Crystal - hidden in the Deep Caverns
The Dusk Crown - lost in the Ancient Crypts
The Nightmare Blade - guarded in the Obsidian Citadel

world_tree_seed.name: Seed of the World Tree
world_tree_seed.description: A seed from the original World Tree, source of all life
world_tree_seed.power: Can restore life to dead lands or grant immortality
world_tree_seed.lore: The World Tree was the first living thing, planted by the gods themselves. Its seeds hold the power of creation.

crown_of_ascension.name: Crown of Ascension
crown_of_ascension.description: Worn by the first king of humanity
crown_of_ascension.lore: Forged by dwarven smiths and blessed by celestials, this crown has never known a tyrant's head.

shadowbane.name: Shadowbane, the Light's Edge
shadowbane.description: A sword forged to destroy the Ancient Evil
shadowbane.power: Burns shadow creatures and nullifies dark magic
shadowbane.location: Wielded by the Lord of Shadows (ironic prison)
shadowbane.lore: Created by the Celestial Heroes to seal away darkness, but corrupted over millennia.

whispering_woods_rangers.purpose: Protect the ancient forests and maintain balance
major_events: Defended the World Tree from corruption
Allied with druids during the Great Blight

obsidian_citadel.lore: Built from solidified darkness itself, the citadel stands as both prison and monument to an ancient battle.

whispering_woods.lore: The trees remember everything and whisper secrets to those who listen. The forest itself is sentient.

the_five_celestials.fate: Sacrificed their immortality to create the seal
the_five_celestials.legacy: Their spirits watch over the realm, appearing in times of dire need

lady_ashford.title: Lady of Hollow Manor
lady_ashford.story: A noble lady who died tragically, her spirit haunts the manor searching for her lost locket

singing_stones.description: Ancient stones that hum with power during celestial events
singing_stones.purpose: Unknown - possibly a map or communication device

missing_sixth_celestial.description: Legends speak of five Celestial Heroes, but ancient texts hint at a sixth
theories: Betrayed the others and joined the darkness
Erased from history for using forbidden magic
Never existed - a myth within a myth
